snippet.title: More tickets available for Midnight Oil's Wollongong show
snippet.content:
Midnight Oil. Picture: Supplied
Limited extra tickets have gone on sale for Midnight Oil's The Great Circle tour this October and November. The "Beds Are Burning" group have also added a third show at Melbourne's Sidney Myer Music Bowl on November 15 with pre-sale tickets to go on sale Tuesday August 8 and general public on Friday August 11.
Fans wanting to snap up a much coveted seat to the Wollongong concert on November 13 can find them at The extra release is part of Frontier Touring's anti-scalping initiatives.
Midnight Oil - Colours of Ostrava | Ostrava, Czech Republic. Picture: Supplied The European leg wrapped up last week after playing to over 250,000 people on that continent including the Oils' first ever concert in the Czech Republic (pictured). They then made a triumphant return to South Africa and will soon play in Singapore before making an encore visit to North America for some big gigs including The Greek Theatre in Los Angeles. By the time the Australian tour launches in Alice Springs on October 2 Midnight Oil will have played 50 gigs in 17 countries. The band will be road hardened and ready. For more information on other concert dates and where to find tickets, visit:
